alert.note: Alert for Loess Plains; Loup Rivers Basin (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued October 22 at 2:58AM CDT until October 23 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY FOR PORTIONS OF SOUTHWEST AND CENTRAL NEBRASKA... The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a Fire Weather Watch for wind and humidity, which is in effect from Sunday afternoon through Sunday evening. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zone 209 Loup Rivers Basin and Fire Weather Zone 219 Loess Plains. * TIMING...Sunday 12 PM to 7 PM CDT. * WINDS...Southwest 20 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...Between 15 and 20 percent. * TEMPERATURES...Highs in the lower to mid 80s. * LIGHTNING...Not anticipated. * IMPACTS...Any fire start will likely spread rapidly and be very difficult to control.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.
